Zhaogu No. 1 Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Hui County, Henan Province

operators: Jiaozuo Coal Group Zhaogu (Xinxiang) Energy Co Ltd
owners: Henan Province Energy Chemical Group Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Jiaozuo Coal Group Zhaogu (Xinxiang) Energy Co Ltd, which is fully owned by Henan Province Energy Chemical Group Co Ltd.
